bibl.title: A Soldier's Epitaph Rescued from the Sea.
bibl.note: Corrected version with notes and translation of a funerary inscription found at Aboukir, ancient Herakleion (early or middle Ptolemaic period) [ed.: Étienne BERNAND, Épitaphe d'un soldat-bouvier, ZPE 140 (2002) pp. 97-98, 1 fac-sim.]. Two elegiac distichs, concerning a soldier who was a citizen of Priene.
CLARYSSE Willy and Marc HUYS, A Soldier's Epitaph Rescued from the Sea.
